Container.Name: mainfrezzer-wireguard-client
Container.Overview: Allows you to connect your containers to a dual-stack or even ipv6 only wireguard server. Comes with Privoxy as http proxy (https://www.privoxy.org/) and mircosocks as socks5 proxy (https://github.com/rofl0r/microsocks)

Config.Name: Lan Network
Config.Description:
Set you ipv4 LAN network in CIDR format.
Only needed if you want to reach something attached to this container and vice versa

Config.Name: Lan IPV6 Network
Config.Description:
Set your ipv6 LAN network in CIDR format. ULA or GUA.
Only needed if you want to reach something attached to this container and vice versa

Config.Name: Privoxy port
Config.Description: Allows you to change the port Privoxy listens on inside the container. If you change it, dont forget to add a new port mapping

Config.Name: Disable Tunnel Enforcement
Config.Description:
Setting ANY value will disable the VPN tunnel enforcement.
That means the container will not ensure that all your traffic is routed through the VPN.
This is useful if you want your containers only to reach specific VPN IPs but otherwise want to use your internet connection
